plot outline: Karungaali is a Tamil film directed by Mu. Kalanjiam. Kanimozhi, a doctor by profession, is drawn to the Ravi because of his life-saving act and ultimately decides to marry him. When Ravi hears about the good-looking patient Amudhanila and her 'inability' to give birth to a child. Ravi's evil mind springs back to have sex with Amudha. He gets close to her pretending to be the doctor's assistant.
title: Karungali
